episode.creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.title: This Week in DAOs #001
episode.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.content:
Spencer is from DAOhaus, a platform for launching Moloch DAOs, a Raid Guild member, and a DAO evangelist.

We talk about:

  • What a DAO is
  • How DAOs can go mainstream
  • Importance of Rage Quitting in DAOs

Follow Spencer on Twitter (@spengrah) Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt) Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
